zipkin.storage.guava

Interface GuavaSpanStore


  • public interface GuavaSpanStore
    An interface that is equivalent to SpanStore but exposes methods as ListenableFuture to allow asynchronous composition.
    See Also:
    SpanStore

    • Method Summary
